title: Strange Plant
info: Strange Plants are quest plant items that can be turned in to the Dye Trader, who rewards the player with 1 out of 33 special dyes, all but two of which are quest-exclusive (the player receives a quantity of 3 of the randomly chosen dye type).
stat:
Type
Furniture
Placeable (1 wide × 1 high)
Use time15 (Very fast)
TooltipCan be traded for rare dyes
Rarity14*
Sell20
Research3 required
